scripts.build: mkdir -p release/momentum && cp manifest.json release/momentum/manifest.json && cp styles.css release/momentum/styles.css && bun build src/main.ts --outfile release/momentum/main.js --target browser --format cjs --external obsidian --external electron --external @codemirror/state --external @codemirror/view --external @codemirror/language --external @codemirror/search --external @lezer/common --external @lezer/highlight --external @lezer/lr
scripts.dev: mkdir -p release/momentum && cp manifest.json release/momentum/manifest.json && cp styles.css release/momentum/styles.css && bun build src/main.ts --outfile release/momentum/main.js --target browser --format cjs --external obsidian --external electron --external @codemirror/state --external @codemirror/view --external @codemirror/language --external @codemirror/search --external @lezer/common --external @lezer/highlight --external @lezer/lr --watch
